de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate

Class AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate.AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImEvaluationComponent<ImAttribute>, ImEvaluationUnit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractImcEvaluationUnitIetf, DefaultImvEvaluationUnit

    public abstract class AbstractImEvaluationUnitIetf
extends Object
implements ImEvaluationUnit
    Generic base for an evaluation unit. Especially important for inheritance.
